Name: Heavy
Description: +1 Might per Rune Level

Name: Light
Description: +1 SPD per Rune Level

Name: Seeking
Description: +5 Accuracy per Rune Level

Name: Defensive
Description: +2 CON per Rune Level

Name: Resistant
Description: +2 WIS per Rune Level

Name: Fortress
Description: +1 CON and WIS per Rune Level

Name: Evasive
Description: +5 Dodge per Rune Level

Name: Wicked
Description: +5 Critical per Rune Level

Name: Blessed
Description: At the start of your turn, recover 3 HP per Rune Level

Name: Healing
Description: The weapon can be used as a staff, and can heal an Ally by Might + INT HP

Name: Throwing
Description: Your weapon gains +1 Max Range, at the cost of 2 Might and 10 Accuracy

Name: Brave
Description: Your Attack and Follow Through Attack trigger twice. Lose 5 Speed and Might

Name: Shadow
Description: Your Follow Through Attacks trigger immediately after your basic attacks

Name: Sweep
Description: Neither you nor your opponent can Follow Through Attack or Riposte

Name: Reaver
Description: Reverse the direction of the Weapon Triangle

Name: Masterwork
Description: Skills that have a %chance of activation get +5% per Rune Level

Name: Wind Sword
Description: Your Sword becomes Magic, Gains Range 1-2, and the special ability Slayer (Fly)

Name: Bolt Axe
Description: Your Axe becomes Magic, Gains Range 1-2, and the special ability Slayer (Dragon)

Name: Fire Lance
Description: Your Lance becomes Magic, Gains Range 1-2, and the special ability Slayer (Carnivore) and Slayer (Herbivore)

Name: Conquerer
Description: When you are attacked without the ability to Counter Attack, reduce damage taken by 10% per Rune Level

Name: Hero
Description: Your Attacks, Follow Through Attacks, Ripostes, and Follow through Ripostes trigger twice in a row. -5 Might and -5 Speed

Name: Mighty
Description: Great Skills that have a %chance of activation get +5% per Rune Level, and Great Skills that deal damage deal +2 Damage per rune level when they trigger
